Name: Skate Central of Sheffield
Address:
Skate Central of Sheffield

On Queens Road in Sheffield
Details:
0114 272 3037
 -
The Skate Central Roller Skating Rink was
formerly the Silver Blades Ice Skating Rink.
It now has public roller skating sessions, a roller
hockey program, a pro shop, a cafe, and a bar.

Name: New Forum Roller Centre
Details:
New Forum Roller Centre

The New forum Roller Centre roller skating rink
in Cambridge closed on August 31, 2004 but the
owners are looking for a new skating venue for
the 8 wheels Rollersports club.  They are also
planning to build a new skating center at some
point in the future.

Name: Eco Dome Twin Ice and Roller Skating Rinks
Details:
Eco Dome Twin Ice and Roller Skating Rinks

This proposed facility for a 27 acre
parcel of land in Gorleston, Norfolk
would have two domes, one for an
Olympic size ice skating rink and one that would
be a combination roller skating rink
and concert venue with 10,000 seats.
If all goes as planned the facility will open in
early 2009.  Facility was designed by
Mellinsus and Johnson Design Architects.

Arun Leisure Centre

Felpham Way, Bognor Regis

West Sussex, England UK
 -
Public skating sessions every Saturday
night from 7 to 9 pm.  Sessions are
arranged by the Arun Roller Skating Club but
they are open to the public.

and Sunday afternoons (3:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m.).

Name: Southwick Saturday Night Roller Disco
Details:
Southwick Saturday Night Roller Disco

Southwick Leisure Centre

Old Barn Way, Southwick, Brighton, England UK

-
Roller disco every Saturday except during the month of August

-
5:00 pm Family session has a speed limit

-
6.15 pm session is for experienced skaters of all ages and beginners over 13 years

-
Games are played at each session and all ages are welcome.  For skate hire booking
and other information phone 01273-238111.
